alert.note: Alert for Ontonagon (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 11:10AM EDT until further notice by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Marquette MI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Michigan... South Branch Ontonagon near Ewen affecting Ontonagon County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...South Branch Ontonagon near Ewen. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 28.5 feet, Water reaches the bottom of the M-28 bridge At 33.0 feet, The lumber yard near the M-28 bridge in Ewen begins to flood * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM EDT Wednesday the stage was 30.3 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 33.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/marquette. The next statement will be issued by Friday morning at 800 AM EDT.
